price: (27) [Pharaoh] said,[1047] "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad."
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
